## Vector2.axisPX() method

Creates a new Vector2 pointing in the positive direction of the X axis, i.e. vec2(1, 0)

**Signature:**

```typescript
static axisPX(): Vector2;
```
**Returns:**

[Vector2](doc/markdown/./base.vector2.md)

The new vector
